  2. 'Matrix here we come': Scientists say AI now able to reproduce new AI on its own for the first time  Washington Examiner
  3. Artificial intelligence now capable of creating new AI without human intervention, scientists say  New York Post
  4. Researchers build AI that can replicate and alter itself and I'm pretty sure that's an opening line from the original Terminator script  TechRadar
  5. Groundbreaking Development - AI now capable of self-generation, creating tools without human assistance  India TV News
